title: Remove add button from display

requirements.text: Remove the 'Add' button from the admin panel display across all management forms (Syllabus, GK, IQ, Second Paper, Third Paper, Exams, Videos, and Notes)

quotes: hlo kina ho add ko botton nai chaina ta display ma

acceptanceCriteria: Add buttons are no longer visible in any admin panel section
Users can still view existing content but cannot add new items
Delete functionality remains intact if needed
No console errors or broken UI from button removal

constraints: Preserve existing delete functionality in admin forms
Do not modify backend logic or data structures
Maintain existing UI layout and styling for remaining elements
nonGoals: Changing the admin panel navigation or tab structure
Modifying user authentication or access control
